testsuite.name: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog in the response specific feedback area for MC questions

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog in the response specific feedback area for MC questions

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog in the response specific feedback area for MC questions

testcase.name: When I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog in the response specific feedback area for MC questions

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog in the response specific feedback area for MC questions

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog in the response specific feedback area for MC questions

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog in the response specific feedback area for MC questions

testcase.name: When I choose "Multiple Choice" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog in the response specific feedback area for MC questions

testcase.name: And I click the Math Editor button in the second response specific feedback editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog in the response specific feedback area for MC questions

testcase.name: Then I assert that the Math Editor dialog is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog in the response specific feedback area for MC questions

testcase.name: And I click Cancel in the Math Editor dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog in the response specific feedback area for MC questions

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog in the response specific feedback area for MC questions
